title: Ninnu Kori first look: Nani has another romance all planned. See pic
text:
Ninnu Kori first look: Nani has another romance all planned. See pic Ninnu Kori first look: Nani has another romance all planned. See pic The majority of Ninnu Kori’s shooting is said to be taking place in the US. Nani also flew to the US soon after the release of Nenu Local for the shooting of the film. Published:February 23, 2017 4:31 pm Nani’s look from his next film Ninnu Kori 
Nani’s next with Nivetha Thomas is titled Ninnu Kori and with its first look being out, we can reveal that the actor is placing his bets on another romantic flick. “Vizag nunchi USA varaku. Chinna pillalanunchi pedha valla varaku. Lovers nunchi pellainavalla varaku (From Vizag to the USA. From children to adults. From lovers to partners),” tweeted Nani along with the poster. The poster shows Nani, with the famous Brooklyn Bridge in the background. The bridge is considered to be one of the most romantic places in the world. 
The majority of Ninnu Kori’s shooting is said to be taking place in the US. The actor also flew to the US soon after the release of Nenu Local for the shooting of the film. Vizag nunchi USA varaku.
